name: piscina-repro-example
description: A minimal example to reproduce potential Piscina and Sharp error handling issues with Node.js v22.x

scripts.test-node20: echo 'Ensure you are using Node.js v20.x and run: node main.js'
scripts.test-node22: echo 'Ensure you are using Node.js v22.x and run: node main.js'
